question: Which institute to develop full-fledged Hyperspectral Imaging Earth observation satellite?
explanation: The Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO) plans to launch a full-fledged niche Earth observation (EO) satellite called the Hyper spectral Imaging Satellite or HySIS using a critical chip it has developed. The HySIS satellite critical chip called an "optical imaging detector array" indigenously developed by ISRO.
